sourcesContent:
import { useLocation, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function FlightDetails() { const { state } = useLocation(); const { flight } = state || {}; const { id } = useParams(); if (!flight) return
No flight data found.
; return (

Flight Details

{/* ⭐ 1) SUMMARY CARD (same style as homepage card) */}
{flight.airline} {flight.flightNo}
{flight.from} → {flight.to}
{flight.depart}
{flight.from}
{flight.durationMin} min
{flight.stops === 0 ? "Nonstop" : `${flight.stops} stop`}
{flight.arrive}
{flight.to}
${flight.price.toFixed(2)}
★ {flight.rating}
{flight.amenities.wifi && WiFi} {flight.amenities.meals && Meals} {flight.amenities.entertainment && Entertainment}
{/* ⭐ 2) LARGE DETAILS CARD */}

Full Flight Information

Airline: {flight.airline}

Flight Number: {flight.flightNo}

From: {flight.from}

To: {flight.to}

Date: {flight.date}

Departure: {flight.depart}

Arrival: {flight.arrive}

Duration: {flight.durationMin} minutes

Stops: {flight.stops === 0 ? "Nonstop" : `${flight.stops} stop(s)`}

Rating: ★ {flight.rating}

Price: ${flight.price.toFixed(2)}

{/* ⭐ 3) BOOKING BOX */}

Total Price: ${flight.price.toFixed(2)}

); } const styles = { page: { fontFamily: "system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, sans-serif", color: "#111", }, hero: { background: "#f6f7fbce", padding: "30px 0", borderRadius: "20px", width: "1200px", margin: "20px auto", boxShadow: "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)", }, heroInner: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center", gap: 25, }, title: { fontSize: 26, fontWeight: 700, }, /* ------------------------------ ⭐ SUMMARY CARD (homepage style) ------------------------------ */ summaryCard: { background: "white", border: "1px solid #e7ebf0", borderRadius: 12, padding: 16, width: "1100px", boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.04)", }, summaryRow: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1.4fr 1fr 1fr 1fr auto", gap: 20, alignItems: "center", }, summaryAirline: { fontWeight: 700, fontSize: 16 }, subtext: { fontSize: 13, color: "#666" }, time: { fontWeight: 700, fontSize: 20 }, price: { fontWeight: 800, fontSize: 20 }, badge: { fontSize: 12, background: "#eef3ff", color: "#2f6feb", padding: "2px 6px", borderRadius: 6, marginLeft: 6, }, amenitiesRow: { marginTop: 10, display: "flex", gap: 10, }, amenity: { fontSize: 12, background: "#f3f4f6", padding: "5px 10px", borderRadius: 6, color: "#444", }, /* ------------------------------ ⭐ BIG DETAILS CARD ------------------------------ */ detailsCard: { background: "white", border: "1px solid #e6e6e6", borderRadius: 12, padding: 24, width: "1100px", boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.06)", }, /* ------------------------------ ⭐ BOOK FLIGHT CARD ------------------------------ */ bookBox: { background: "white", border: "1px solid #d4d8e0", borderRadius: 12, padding: 24, width: "1100px", textAlign: "center", boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.05)", }, bookBtn: { marginTop: 12, height: 46, background: "#2f6feb", border: "none", color: "white", width: "100%", borderRadius: 8, fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 700, cursor: "pointer", }, };
